title: Test Decentralized Book Club
summary: Read and discuss books with global readers using Web3.
description: A platform where users join book clubs powered by blockchain for governance, voting on next reads, and reward points via tokens. Integrated with NFTs for membership badges, and authors can airdrop exclusive content.

title: Voice-to-Code Playground
summary: Write and test code using only your voice.
description: An interactive coding sandbox where you can build JavaScript snippets using voice commands. Includes speech-to-text integration, inline evaluation, and AI-assisted completions with explanation.

title: Minimal Habit Tracker
summary: A distraction-free habit tracker with streak logic.
description: Log daily habits and visualize streaks with beautiful animations. No account required. Sync with local storage or optional Supabase login for multi-device support.

title: Time-Zone Team Visualizer
summary: View your remote team's time zones on a radial clock.
description: Help remote teams schedule better meetings by showing overlapping work hours on a visual clock. Add teammates via link or username. Includes Google Calendar export.

title: Startup Name Generator
summary: Generate unique, brandable names for startups.
description: Enter a few keywords and get name suggestions powered by GPT, domain checks, and logo ideas. Includes inspiration mode for random creativity and AI tagline generator.

title: Crypto Transaction Visualizer
summary: Watch your crypto wallet's transaction history like a movie.
description: Fetch transaction history for Ethereum wallets and animate token movements, volume spikes, and wallet interactions. Can be embedded in personal dashboards.

title: AI Mood Journal
summary: Track your emotions with daily writing and AI reflection.
description: A private journal that uses AI to summarize your mood, find patterns, and suggest habits or affirmations. Includes calendar heatmaps and optional therapist sharing.

title: Gamified Budget App
summary: Turn saving money into a game.
description: Users earn XP for logging expenses, completing savings challenges, and hitting weekly budget goals. Level up your savings avatar and unlock new reward themes.

title: Open Source Job Board
summary: A curated board for open source contributor jobs.
description: Lists paid and volunteer roles for popular open source projects, sortable by tech stack, difficulty, and company. Integrated with GitHub issues and Open Collective.

title: Dev Quote Wallpaper Generator
summary: Create wallpapers with your favorite programming quotes.
description: Choose from popular dev quotes or enter your own, then generate a stylish wallpaper using custom fonts, themes, and code background noise. Export for desktop or mobile.

title: AI Travel Itinerary Builder
summary: Plan trips with AI-curated day-by-day itineraries.
description: Users enter destination, interests, and duration. The app generates optimized travel plans with activity times, maps, food spots, and optional flight/hotel suggestions using GPT. Save plans, share them, or export to PDF.
